code: import axios from"axios";var instance=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:5000"});instance.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem("profile")){req.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("profile")).token);}return req;});export var getPdfs=function getPdfs(){return instance.get("/pdfs");};export var createPdf=function createPdf(newPdf){return instance.post("/pdfs/add",newPdf);};export var getPdfData=function getPdfData(pdf){return instance.post("/pdfs/get",pdf);};export var updatePdf=function updatePdf(pdf){return instance.patch("/pdfs/update",pdf);};export var deletePdf=function deletePdf(id){return instance.delete("/pdfs/delete/".concat(id));};
